components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Backup Managed

incident_updates.body: Start time: 24/05/2023 22:00 UTC User impact : Due to difficulties encountered during operations on this ongoing : maintenance, the back up on one of the concerned servers is temporary unavailable. Root cause : Incident caused by difficulties encountered on this: maintenance Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on it to restore the service.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and and ESXi upgrade

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 02/05/2023 06:00 UTC End time : 26/05/2023 16:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere and Zerto will be inaccessible for 3 hours during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service
